Class Layer

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.map.Layer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProxyLayer, TileLayer
public abstract class Layer extends Object
A layer is a grouping of similar MapObjects.
Author:
Erik Engstrom, Douglas Lau
